subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Bernard Gruber of Austria won a Nordic combined World Cup event in Zakopane, Poland, for his first victory of the season.Gruber, who was second after the ski-jumping portion, won with a total of 18 minutes 51.8 seconds after completing the 7.5-kilometer sprint. Tommy Schmid of Switzerland was second, 12 seconds behind, and Bill Demong of the United States, who was the fastest in the sprint, was third, 13 seconds back.
